meta.title: Ping PLD - Custom, Limited Edition, and Milled Putters
meta.description: Introducing Ping PLD custom, limited edition and milled putters. Take your game to the next level.

pageBanner.heading: Introducing PLD
pageBanner.subheading: A premium line of custom milled putters

overview.title: A Premium Line of Milled and Custom Putters
overview.description: Milled for precision, built to perfection to fit your game, just like the tour pros. Put more than 60 years of engineering excellence in your hands. You’ll putt better, score lower and smile more.

customs.title: A custom experience like no other.
customs.subtitle: You design it, we build it.
customs.description: Together we craft a one-of-a-kind milled putter custom fit and custom built to your game. There’s no limit to what we’ll create, so think big. You can experience it virtually, or in person. It starts with the most thorough putter fitting in golf and ends with a putter customized only for you. Even our tour players will be envious.

image.alt: A Custom Experience Like No Other
